text: U.S.D. Recanatese 1923 is an Italian association football club, based in Recanati, Marche. Recanatese currently plays in Serie D. == History == The club was founded in 1923. == Colors and badge == The team's colors are yellow and red. == References == == External links == * Category:Football clubs in Italy Category:Association football clubs established in 1923 Category:Football clubs in the Marche Category:1923 establishments in Italy
title: U.S.D. Recanatese 1923
